samples.name: Dynamic Page Freestyle Example
samples.description: Dynamic Page freestyle example with a responsive sap.m.Table in the content area, showing that each control can be placed in the title and the header content areas.

samples.name: Dynamic Page with sap.m.Table
samples.description: Dynamic Page containing a sap.m.Table in the content area and filtering options in the header (SAP Fiori 2.0 List Report floorplan).

samples.name: Dynamic Page with Analytical Table
samples.description: Dynamic Page containing an Analytical Table in the content area and filters in the header aligned with the SAP Fiori 2 List Report floorplan.

samples.name: Flexible Column Layout
samples.description: Clicking on a link in a column opens the next column.

samples.name: Avatar
samples.description: This sample demonstrates different combinations of types, shapes, and sizes of the Avatar.

samples.name: Semantic Page using Draft Indicator
samples.description: This sample demonstrates the use of a DraftIndicator in the footer area.

samples.name: Semantic Page - Freestyle Sample
samples.description: This sample demonstrates a SemanticPage with all semantic-specific actions both in the title and in the footer areas.
